title: Participatory Design Research-Based Instructional Design for Bilingual Literacy Education

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental Understanding of Bilingual Education Theory and Mathematics Curriculum
context.additional_context: Pre-service teachers learning educational resistance toward marginalized groups by designing and applying dual-language literacy strategies in mathematics instruction

learning_goals: Learners can develop bilingual literacy lesson designs for mathematics based on participatory design research (PDR) methodology
Learners can propose at least three assessment criteria for bilingual literacy utilizing translanguaging concepts
Learners can produce at least one set of bilingual mathematics instructional materials (digital/analog) supporting minoritized students
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
